post.body: yeah it's pretty awesome!! I love it!
Danielle wants to see melissa greene while we're in nashville
mall hopping in Nashville 2day. Had a cold since we got here, & lost my voice b/c of it. I love sinus issues NOT!! But I do love Nashville!
http://twitpic.com/y3yt - IMG00260.jpg
Lovin Nashville! Wish I lived here!
In Nashville for New Year's SO excited. Went to a Diana DeGarmo show last night. Amazing!! Today going to look for TOMS & more fun stuff!!
Up early getting ready to sing this morning!!
Gettin ready to sing twice 2morrow, doin laundery, getting ready 4 Nashville, Fun times :) About to get haircut by Mom. I'm a little scared.
Frustrated b/c I can't find my birth certificate and I need a passport!!
Just watched MAMMA MIA! w/ Mama. I want to go to Greece now!!
Spent all day watching the Special Features on the MAMMA MIA! dvd. lol About to go get Guthrie's for dinner!! :)
One hour left of Christmas :( Thank You Lord for coming here!! Watching the Christmas Classics to close out the day :):) Merry Christmas!
Merry Christmas everyone!! Don't forget to watch 24 hours of a Christmas Story on TBS!!
So thankful for family and friends and all of the GREAT things of Christmas. Thank You Jesus!!
http://twitpic.com/w451 - IMG00251.jpg
Montgomery was horrendous & now I'm @ joelys doin christmas w/mamas fam.& its hot & raining! Yuck! But fun w/ fam
I can't believe I'm saying it, but I've gotta go shopping today! On Christmas Eve! It's gonna be worse than yesterday. Getting mom stuff :)
So I am finally in the bed after a long day of shopping, wrapping, cleaning, & cooking. I think I'm gonna watch a Christmas movie!!
these people at the mall are nuts!
http://twitpic.com/vpfw - IMG00250.jpg
